div.l: Ful pale he was for drunke and nat red
He yesketh and he spekith throuȝ the nose
As he were on the quakke or on the pose
To bedde he goth and with him goth his wif
As any Iay he liȝt was and iolif
So was her ioli whisteles wel I wet
The cradel at her beddes feet is set
To rokke and yeue the childe souke
And whan that dronken was al in the crouke
To bedde went the douȝter riȝt anon
To bedde goth Aleyn and also Iohn
There nas nomore hem nedeth no dwale
This Millere hath so wiseli bibed ale
That as an hors he snorteth in his slepe
Ne of his taill behinde he took no kepe
His wif bar him a burdon ful strong
Men miȝt her routing hiere a furlong
The wenche routed eke par company
Aleyn the clerk that herd this melodie
He priked Iohn and seide slepest thou
Herd thou euer slik a sang or now
Lo slike a coupling is with euill haill
A wilde fire vpon ther bodyes falle
Wha herde euer such a ferli thing
Ye they shal haue the flour of euil ending
This long niȝt me tides no rest
But yit na force al sall be for the best
For Iohn seide as euer mot I thriue
Yef that I may yon lasse shal I swyue
Som esement has lawe shapen vs
For Iohn there is a lawe that seith thus
That gif a man in a point be greued
That in an othir he shal be releued
Oure corn is stolne this is no nay
And we han had an euil fitt today
And syn I shal haue non amendement
Agein my losse I shal haue an esement
Be goddes saule it sal non othir be
This Iohn answerd · Alein avise the
The Millere is a perlous man he seide
And gif that he out of his slepe breide
He miȝt do vs bathe a vilanie
